name: TeachingOnlinePodcast
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teaching online podcast
des: Listen to the latest episode of the Teaching Online Podcast. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
